Adds_Leviathan's Tail_Status_Mantle Of T: Reflecting damage dealt by magic attacks.
Adds_Wavespine Sahagin_Status_Paralysis_: Deadened nerves are sometimes preventing the execution of actions.
Adds_Wavetooth Sahagin_Status_Hysteria_D: Unable to act on your own free will.
Bosse_Leviathan_Status_Briny Mirror_Desc: Covered in a watery membrane. Any party member who uses a healing spell or action on you receives the Briny Veil status.
Bosse_Leviathan_Status_Briny Veil_Desc: Covered in a watery membrane which impairs vision, reducing your attack range. A stack of 16 will render you unable to act.
Bosse_Leviathan_Status_Veil Of The Whorl: Reflecting damage dealt by ranged attacks.

Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Hysteria_Des: Unable to act on your own free will.
